thread.title: Heidi Klum Stuns With No Makeup in This Glam Transformation Video Before the Oscars!
thread.title_full: Heidi Klum Stuns With No Makeup in This Glam Transformation Video Before the Oscars!

author: Leanne Aguilera
title: Heidi Klum Stuns With No Makeup in This Glam Transformation Video Before the Oscars!
text: Heidi Klum Stuns With No Makeup in This Glam Transformation Video Before the Oscars! by Leanne Aguilera   Instagram Even without makeup, Heidi Klum is simply stunning! While getting ready for Sunday's Academy Awards, the 43-year-old supermodel shared a time-lapse video of her transformation from fresh-faced to absolutely gorgeous. "Oscars Glam from start to finish!" she captioned the mesmerizing Instagram post that shows her being poked and prodded with brushes, gloss and lashes. EXCLUSIVE: Heidi Klum Teases Valentine's Day Plans With Boyfriend Vito Schnabe Klum also made to sure give credit to her glam squad: makeup artist Linda Hay and hairstylist Wendy Iles . Considering Klum still looks flawless without makeup, we think her boyfriend, Vito Schnabe , is a very lucky man. ET recently caught up with the Project Runway executive producer earlier this month and she confessed that she had some big plans in store for Valentine's Day. "I'm very romantic and old fashioned," Klum confessed, adding that she had a few surprises in store for her 30-year-old beau. "I do [have things planned], but if I tell them to you right now, then they wouldn't be a surprise anymore!" Click through our gallery below to see even more of Hollywood's biggest stars shining bright on the Oscars red carpet. RELATED SLIDESHOW
